comments.body: That is a great idea to promote any project and to promote this idea of yours you can use the latest web 3 micro blogging platform There a vibrant team of 5000 plus members can help spread the word about the projectmost importantly As part of our current project onblarding limited time opportunity you would not have to incur any expenses.We would like to take it forward with you and discuss your project requirementscan we connect for this ?
